title: Discover Fez, Morocco
description: Experience the perfect blend of ancient culture and modern hospitality in Morocco's cultural capital

venue.name: Fez Convention Center
venue.description: A state-of-the-art facility equipped with modern technology and amenities for international conferences.
features: 5 conference halls with capacity up to 500 attendees
Exhibition space for sponsors and demos

airport.name: Fez-Saïs Airport (FEZ)
airport.description: The closest airport, just 15km from the city center with regular international connections.
features: Direct flights from major European cities
Airport shuttle and taxi services available

accommodation.title: Partner Hotels
accommodation.description: We've negotiated special rates with premium hotels near the conference venue.

hotels.name: Hotel Sahrai
hotels.description: Luxury hotel with panoramic city views

hotels.name: Riad Fes
hotels.description: Traditional riad in the heart of the medina

practicalInfo.currency: Moroccan Dirham (MAD), Credit cards widely accepted
practicalInfo.language: Arabic, Berber, French widely spoken, English in hotels
practicalInfo.visa: Many nationalities can enter visa-free for 90 days

attractions.name: Medina of Fez
attractions.description: UNESCO World Heritage site with medieval architecture

attractions.name: Al-Qarawiyyin University
attractions.description: One of the world's oldest continuously operating universities

attractions.name: Chouara Tannery
attractions.description: Traditional leather tanning process dating back centuries

culinary.description: Fez is renowned for its exceptional cuisine, blending Arab, Berber, and French influences. Don't miss these local specialties:
